org.title: Share with organisation
org.descriptionOn: This knowledge base is shared with all users of your organisation
org.descriptionOff: This knowledge base is not shared with all users of your organisation

create.title: Share Knowledge Base with Team
create.description: This will make the knowledge base available to all members of {{teamName}}

delete.title: Remove Team Share
delete.description: This will remove access to the knowledge base for all members of {{teamName}}

create.title: Share Knowledge Base with Organization
create.description: This will make the knowledge base available to all members of your organization

delete.title: Remove Share
delete.description: This will remove access to the knowledge base for all members of your organization

emptyState.title: No knowledge bases yet
emptyState.description: Create your first knowledge base. Upload documents and use them in your chats as context for the AI.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Knowledge Base
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? All associated documents will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

createDialog.title: Create New Knowledge Base
createDialog.description: Create a new knowledge base to organize documents and use them in chats.

form.shortDescriptionHint: A good description helps the AI understand when to use this knowledge base.

create.error: Failed to create knowledge base. Please try again.

delete.error: Failed to delete knowledge base. Please try again.
delete.notFound: Knowledge base not found. It may have been deleted.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Update the name and description of your knowledge base.

form.descriptionHint: A good description helps the AI understand when to use this knowledge base.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Knowledge Base
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? All associated documents will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

update.error: Failed to update knowledge base. Please try again.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Manage the documents in this knowledge base. Supported formats: PDF, DOCX.
documents.empty: No documents uploaded yet. Upload a PDF or DOCX file to get started.
documents.uploadError: Failed to upload document. Please try again.
documents.urlDialogDescription: Enter the URL of a website to import its content into the knowledge base.
documents.addUrlSuccess: URL added successfully! The website content is being processed.
documents.addUrlError: Failed to add URL. Please check the URL and try again.
documents.removeError: Failed to remove document. Please try again.
